thumb.title: Getting Late (original song, Vocaloid, Taku & Jessica)
thumb.description: It's about being let down on a night out, as a metaphor for being let down more generally. Tech NotesDrums are from Groove Agent, Backbone and Reason loops played in Dr.OctoRex. Bass sounds from Halion, Roland Zenology (the free one), Reason Malstrom & Subtractor Combo'd, Arturia CS-80. Synths and gurgles from Halion, Padshop, Retrologue; The Grand piano; BBC brass touches; Reason cello (via NN-XT); choir sounds from Halion (Olympus) & Reason (NN-XT & NN19). More elements than I remembered! Vocal synths are courtesy of Vocaloid 6's Taku & Jessica. More delay (Studio Delay mainly) and reverb (Arturia Plate 140) than I remembered! Video CreditsMadison Inouye: https://www.pexels.com/video/video-of-grass-2097416/ Nathan Cowley: https://www.pexels.com/video/blades-of-grass-2480792/ Nazim Zafri: https://www.pexels.com/video/stalk-of-grass-swaying-in-the-wind-2762211/ cottonbro studio: https://www.pexels.com/video/a-man-standing-in-the-middle-of-a-field-with-his-arms-outstretched-4441000/
